abstract: Coca-Cola Company announces that it will reach its goal of replenishing 160 billions liters of water to environment and communities by end of 2015, five years in advance of its original stated date of 2020; company announced goal in 2007, and has engaged in 209 community water projects in 61 countries.
lead_paragraph: The beverage company announced a plan in 2007 to replenish the amount of water equivalent to its sales volume — about 160 billion liters — by 2020. It could get to that point this year.

headline.main: Coca-Cola Says It’s Close to Water Replenishment Goal
headline.print_headline: Coca-Cola Says It’s Close to Water Replenishment Goal
